text:
Ottawa native Christoff Bemis, 29, has spent the last four years as a member of Birdsfoot Farm. He is a cook at a restaurant in Canton.

Bemis says the best way to describe life at Birdsfoot is that they are just a family.

"We're kind of stuck together," says Bemis. "We like each other, occasionally get on each others nerves, but I think we all genuinely want to be here and want to make it work, and that's what keeps us going, keeps us sane."
